law.catch_line: The Department may refuse to renew a permit for a landfill system if:...
law.text:
The Department may refuse to renew a permit for a landfill system if:
The permit holder violates any provision of this subtitle, any regulation adopted under this subtitle, any condition of the permit, or, if operating a landfill in another state, any statute, regulation, or permit of that state concerning landfill systems;
The Department finds that continued operation of the landfill system would be injurious to public health or the environment; or
The Department finds that there is any other good cause.
